item.title: Plot Taiwan with Matplotlib Basemap
item.description: *It is recommended to use cartopy instead of Basemap now. %matplotlib inline import matplotlib.pyplot as plt from mpl_toolkits.basemap import Basemap import numpy as np # set map region minLat, maxLat = 21.75, 25.5 minLon, maxLon = 119.25, 122.5 # White Background fig = plt.figure(figsize=(6, 9)) ax = fig.add_axes([0.025, 0.025, 0.925, 0.925]) # plot map m = Basemap(projection='cyl',resolution='h',llcrnrlat=minLat, \ urcrnrlat=maxLat, llcrnrlon=minLon, urcrnrlon=maxLon, ax=ax) m.drawcoastlines(color='k') m.drawcountries(color='k') # draw parallels. parallels = np.
